author: Chris Kornelis
title: A Couple Wants to Get Serious About Saving After Doubling Their Income
text:
Five years ago, Lindsey and Dominic Hartjes were both teaching at schools in rural Minnesota, living on $80,000 a year. After a move to Minneapolis and new jobs for both of them, the couple doubled their income. Now the 35-year-olds want to get serious about saving, including putting aside money for college for their two children, ages 2 and 6, while carving out some funds for family travel.
